title: Train service delayed due to power fault

title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api tertangguh kerana kerosakan kuasa
title_translations.ta: தொடர்வண்டி சேவை மின்சாரக் கோளாறு காரணமாக தாமதமானது

updates.text: Update from SBST: Train services between #DhobyGhaut and #HarbourFront are now running normally. Free bus ride is still available.
Update from SBST: NEL train service down between Dhoby Ghaut &HarbourFront. Recovery work still in progress. Expected to resume at 4.30pm.
Update by SBST: No NEL train service in both directions between DhobyGhaut & HarbourFront. Free bus ride available at designated bus stops.
Update from SBST: NEL train service down between Dhoby Ghaut & HarbourFront. Recovery work still in progress. Expected to resume at 4.30pm.
Update from SBST: No NEL train service in both directions between Dhoby Ghaut & HarbourFront stations. Service estimated to resume at 4.30pm
Update from SBST: No NEL train service in both directions between Dhoby Ghaut & HarbourFront stations due to a power fault.
[SBST] NEL: No train service between #DhobyGhaut and #HarbourFront in both directions. Please wait for further update.
[SBST] NEL UPDATE: Free shuttle buses are now available at affected stations between #DhobyGhaut and #HarbourFront.
[SBST] NEL: Train service in both directions is delayed by about 15 minutes due to a power fault.
